h1_title: The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm
content: You'll find a large empty field up the slope, leading to a shrouded gate of fog that lets you enter The Great Pagoda. Inside, you can activate a Shrine, but you'll find there's no one in this grand room.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Pagoda_Realm_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm', specifically from the subsection 'Snow-Veiled Trail'.
The content is as follows:
You'll find a large empty field up the slope, leading to a shrouded gate of fog that lets you enter The Great Pagoda. Inside, you can activate a Shrine, but you'll find there's no one in this grand room.
